author: Marvel Entertainment
description:
Today on The Official Marvel Podcast, we’re digging into the legacy of Marvel Zombies throughout comics as we explore their creation, their evolution, and of course the carnage with Marvel Comics legend Ralph Macchio along with current Marvel Senior Editor Jordan D. White. Plus, we keep the spooky vibes going with a chilling story from the Marvel archives. All time codes are approximate.

00:00 - Welcome Back!
01:09 - Legacy of Marvel Zombies in Comics w/ Marvel Comics legend Ralph Macchio and Marvel Senior Editor Jordan D. White
18:40 - Chilling story from the Marvel archives

title: The Legacy of Marvel Zombies in Marvel Comics
